alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:59PM EDT until June 09 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Beaufort County in southeastern South Carolina... Jasper County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellinger Hill Area to near Hilton Head Island, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Hilton Head Island, Bluffton, Bellinger Hill Area, Folly Field, Hilton Head Airport and Forest Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
